<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Psychic Rapport](/Feats.aspx?ID=3659) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 24</row>

</column>

---

Your telepathic sensitivity intensifies when you're affected by mental magic, making it easier for you to link to other creatures. After you Cast a Spell with the [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) trait, until the start of your next turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5), [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6), and [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) checks, and to Perception checks to [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=85).
name: Psychic Rapport
